capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville's lineage is indeed quite impressive. I mean, being a pure-blood wizard from the famous Black family is no small feat. It's clear that his heritage has played a significant role in shaping who he is today.

I've always been fascinated by Neville's story, you know? He was a true Gryffindor at heart, even if he didn't always show it. I mean, the fact that his family had such a strong lineage of pure-blood wizards is just incredible. It's no wonder he felt like an outsider among his own people, though - being a half-blood in a world where bloodline was everything can be really tough.
